ru.yandex.yandexmapkit
Class MapController

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.MapController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DownloadHandler, GestureListener
public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GestureListener, DownloadHandler

MapController.java: The map controller. This class contains the instance of the map model (MapModel) and the OverlayManager which is created by the MapController constructor. The controller handles user events (the onTouchEvent() method) and sends them to the OverlayManager to control layers. If required, it can change the map using scrollMapToPoint(), zoomIn() and other methods. It also handles map events OnMapListener and sends messages to all listeners of these events.

This file is a part of the Yandex Map Kit.

You may obtain a copy of the License at http://legal.yandex.ru/mapkit/
